template <typename R, typename F>
struct vsip::impl::Unary_function
File: ../../../vsip/core/fns_userelt.hpp

Unary function adapter for unary expression blocks. The Operator template parameter of the expression block template takes a single type argument, while user extension functions take two. The Unary_function template provides an adapter such that the Unary_function_return_type template will do the right thing when given a 'Unary_function<Result, Function>::Type'.

Specializations:
Unary_function<F::result_type,F>
Unary_function<R,R(*)(A)>
-Public Class templates
